title: Schedule Of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill Meeting Today | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 09, 2009

 



Schedule Of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill Meeting Today




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                    June 9, 2009  SCHEDULE OF JUDGE SOTOMAYOR’S CAPITOL HILL MEETINGS  TUESDAY, JUNE 9 Today, Judge Sotomayor will visit Capitol Hill to meet with the following Senators: Senator Michael Bennet  Senator Roland Burris  Senator Maria Cantwell  Senator Bob Casey  Senator Jim DeMint  Senator Mel Martinez  Senator Ben Nelson  Senator Richard Shelby   ##
